full_summary:
# Joint Fires Modernization (JFM) - Request for Information #2

## Overview

The Department of National Defence and Public Works and Government Services Canada are seeking information from industry stakeholders on the Joint Fires Modernization (JFM) project.

## Additional Information

* Posting Number: W8476-195949/C
* Posting Date: May 9, 2023
* Closing Date: August 15, 2023 14:00

## Details

The JFM project aims to modernize radio and television communications equipment for military operations. The project involves the procurement of equipment to support joint fires and electromagnetic warfare capabilities.

## Tender Description

The bid application process is competitive, with suppliers able to submit proposals in either English or French. Documents may be submitted in either official language. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

## Contracting Information

* Procurement Category: Major Capital Procurement
* Location: Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region)
* Contracting Entity: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* Contact Information:
	+ Contact Name: Scott Phillips
	+ Contact Title: 
	+ Email: darren.langdon@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (819) 230-4362

## Associated Documents

Please find the associated documents for this RFI at the following links:

* [Link1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/05/08/797e145fe741343943fb92597755d76a/ABES.PROD.PW__BM.B036.E29063.EBSU000.PDF)
* [Link2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/07/10/2c2a2510daa7e3201b6d4d51136b6251/ABES.PROD.PW__BM.B036.E29063.EBSU001.PDF)
* [Link3](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/07/10/641f0ed200b92db714a7ef59f9da9a8f/ABES.PROD.PW__BM.B036.E29063.ATTA001.PDF)
